Linear Models

```{r}
team_box_scores <- team_box_scores %>%
    mutate(netrating = offrating - defrating)
```

```{r}
empty_model_net <- lm(netrating ~ 1, data = team_box_scores)
summary(empty_model_net)
```

```{r}
net_model_one <- lm(netrating ~ ftar + tov + threefg_pct, data = team_box_scores)
summary(net_model_one)
```
